questions.question: Why can AI make mistakes according to the video?
choices: Because it learns from patterns that can sometimes be incorrect or confusing
Because AI is less intelligent than humans
Because AI does not use data at all
Because AI always follows exact instructions without error

questions.question: What example does Doofenshmirtz give to show his Inator making a mistake?
choices: Turning his sandwich into a sock
Turning his sock into a sandwich

questions.question: What is the relationship between the quality of data and AI's results as explained in the video?
choices: Weird or poor data patterns lead to weird or incorrect AI results
Better data always makes AI slower
AI results are not affected by data quality
AI ignores data patterns when making decisions
